creator: Oliver.Moehrke@web.de
text:
Created attachment 27097
Sample containing a simple FO-file and it's PDF/A-1b result that cannot be verified correctly.

Inserting a bookmark-tree with at least one internal-destination bookmark into a (XSL-)FO file disrupts the PDF/A-1b compatibility of the resulting PDF file. FOP in fact creates a PDF/A-1b file, but verifying it's PDF/A compatiblity using Adobe Preflight 9 or Intarsys PDF/A Live! (http://www.intarsys.de/pdfa-check) issues an error regarding "EOL sequences before/after keywords".

Discarding the bookmark-tree from the (XSL-)FO file fixes the compatibility issue.

The attached ZIP-file contains the sample FO file "bookmark_error.fo" and the corresponding FOP v1.0 generated PDF/A-1b result "bookmark_error.pdf" that fails PDF/A compatibility checks. A recent nightly build version (25.05.2011) has the same problem as the v1.0 release.
